data.title: Dana Strong on LinkedIn: This week, Sky agreed a new deal with Lega Serie A to bring our Sky Italia…
data.meta_description: This week, Sky agreed a new deal with Lega Serie A to bring our Sky Italia customers more of the biggest games, more highlights, and more of the best match…
data.text: This week, Sky agreed a new deal with Lega Serie A to bring our Sky Italia customers more of the biggest games, more highlights, and more of the best match slots on Saturday, Sunday and Monday nights. This is great news for our customers at home, and our business customers in bars, hotels and other public venues. On top of our exclusive coverage in Italy of the UEFA Champions League, all UEFA Europa League games, and all UEFA EURO 2024 matches, Sky now truly is the undisputed home of sport in Italy. https://lnkd.in/e6K3cih2
